website_summaries.verdict: A modern lamp that will easily stand out in dark spaces.
pros: Operates easily with a foot step switch
cons: Rice paper shade rips easily if you're not careful

customer_reviews.title: Great in an office setting
customer_reviews.text: Really love how this looks in my new office setup. I bought both the table and floor lamp and really like how the two complement each other. I ended up using 60w light bulbs in the floor lamp as well and it is perfect, not too bright, not too dim. The picture attached is a bit brighter than they actually appear.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nearly set our apartment on fire after two years of use
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for the 2-3 years we had them (we bought 2). Loved it. Looked nice. Not any real problems. Then tonight, one of them had a pretty bad short, could have caused a fire. Simply moving it caused the light to flicker, and my bedroom now smells of electrical smoke. Looks nice, but I don't think I'll be purchasing Adesso from now on. And we'll be avoiding paper shades that don't have much breathing room from bulbs if we can help it.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy ikea lamps! Sturdy and classy
customer_reviews.text: The lamp was much taller and sturdier than what i expected. It was easy to put it together. It is a great lamp. I bought it for my bedroom, but it was so good I replaced it with the one in the living room! The wood base is quite visible and makes it look even more grand. I have bought flimsy lamps from ikea and this lamp for the price is a great buy. Highly recommended for those seeking a modern/contemporary touch.
customer_reviews.author: kar2ram

customer_reviews.title: Wow...Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is of exceptional high quality. Very heavy and sturdy. The metal poles are very thick and the base wood(which is beautiful) is solid dense wood. I like the foot pedal also. For the just under a $100.00, this lamp is an awesome deal. It give light very well and the shade is pretty. It is very tall and almost as tall as me. I love retro modern furniture and I will be giving Adesso my repeat business. UPDATE: It's been many years since I have had this lamp now and it is still awesome! Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: dman

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp but shade has 2 seams
customer_reviews.text: Nice lamp with a quality wood base. Puts out a good amount of light. Unfortunately the paper shade has two seams, 180 degrees apart, so there is no way to position it to hide them.
customer_reviews.author: W. SteblerTop Contributor: Amazon Echo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, Well Made, Gorgeous ambient light, or bright enough to read by with LED bulbs.
customer_reviews.text: Love it so much. I ordered another. Well packaged. Easy to assemble in minute. If you use LED bulbs, you can get great filtered light, at low wattage. Comes packaged with bulbs which are adequate, but I wanted a little brighter in our main living room. Wood base is first class. Foot Pedal on off switch. Gives a significant amount of light in our high, vaulted ceiling great room.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Fix it

customer_reviews.title: Nice light but the switches aren't great
customer_reviews.text: These are blindingly bright if you don't put very low lumen bulbs in them - 3 bulbs at waist height are much brighter than you expect. Once I got that dialed in with the right bulbs I've enjoyed these greatly, except that the floor switches frequently don't catch, requiring multiple hits to turn them on. This started within the first month or two of owning them.
customer_reviews.author: Lincoln Russell

customer_reviews.title: Ours broke down in a year
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is broken after a year's use. I has been turned on and off once a day, averaging 6 days a week. The "nifty" little step-on floor switch is broken and no longer turned it on. We've taken that switch apart and can see the broken, non-replaceable part that causes the problem. We may have to replace switch, or replace the entire line. I was happy with the look, and with the light it threw, but those days are over.
customer_reviews.author: tomatobob

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp
customer_reviews.text: The shade is a little flimsy, it's the typical rice paper with the wire in it so it collapses down flat. If you use the three 100-watt bulbs like it says it takes, the light is blindingly bright. I swapped out the 100-watt bulbs for 75's, then 60's then finally put ONE 40-watt bulb in it and the light is finally low enough for my living room. In some pictures of this lamp the shade looks square, but it's actually round. Although it's kind of nice, and fills the spot I needed light for, I think in retrospect the price is pretty high for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: LulaTrixiebelle

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings. Don't think it's a $75 product.
customer_reviews.text: Mixed feelings on this one. Don't think it's worth 75 bucks. Came damaged. Shipping packaged was terrible. Corner of base bashed in. But such a pain to return. It does look different I guess modern. Assembly was very easy which is appreciated. If I could give 3 1/2 stars that's more accurate. I have 3 LED bulbs in it. Not that light. Some people might love it and I understand.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Just go to Ikea
customer_reviews.text: This cheap piece of crap has a nice, heavy base, but that's about it. It's lopsided, the hardware doesn't align, and it looks cheaper than the $10 Ikea lamp it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: someguyinatlanta

customer_reviews.title: Might be worth it?
customer_reviews.text: Base and pole are beautifully finished. Shade seams are visible regardless of angle because there are two. The pole doesn't sit well so it leans slightly and can't be adjusted adequately to compensate because if the pole is screwed in further the cord won't emerge on the wall side without fully exposing seams. Pretty but imperfect.
customer_reviews.author: EK

customer_reviews.title: Not very bright. Not very easy to build. But definitely looks nice. Get bright bulbs
customer_reviews.text: My bedroom doesn't have a hanging light so I needed a floor lamp. I had one that I bought from Target but I thought it looked tacky and wasn't very bright. Building this thing wasn't as easy as I'd hoped. And the styrofoam they use in the packaging went everywhere. It would have been nice to not have to vacuum after building it. All that said, I like the thing. I think it's stylish and neat. I can't say it's particularly bright but that might be due to the bulbs I bought. I got some 100 watt bulbs for this thing. It was plenty bright without the cover on it but who would not put the cover on it.
customer_reviews.author: Melvin Soriano

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction but not so much light resonance
customer_reviews.text: The design is solid with no rips or tears of the rice paper upon delivery. Setup very easily and everything works as described. The only discrepancy between what I got and what I expected was that 1) the light bulbs are very densely oriented within the lamp (closer to the middle and not all spread out like the image above implies) and 2) that unless you go for the 100 watt bulbs it may be tough to light up an entire room with 2 of these (I bought 2 60 watt equivalent bulbs and it lights up the room but the other side still appears slightly dim and I wish I purchased 100 watt ones)
customer_reviews.author: Roman M

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality, very light weight
customer_reviews.text: Poor Quality, very light weight, cheap feel and appearance. They claim "beautiful white rice paper shades". That's false advertising. Its actually cheap thin wrinkled paper shades. Both came packaged in one box. I opened, realized the product description exaggerates the product and returned the same day. Of course no problem from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Prince Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great light, ended up buying three.
customer_reviews.text: Great light, ended up buying three. Paired with a dimmer this is a terrific value and it beats the other options out there. Take care in your bulb choices as this will affect the quality and feel of your lighting as well as energy use...Thanks, nice product, and much better than other Adesso (Torchiere) lamp I tried which was poorly made, this is well made and a good value.
customer_reviews.author: SD Cardsmith

customer_reviews.title: love this lamp
customer_reviews.text: love this lamp, easy to put together,. i do not have a ceiling light,but this lamp lights up my entire living room. have checked other sites for this lamp, but amazon was the cheapest. have had lots of compliments, in fact i am ordering another for a friend. when putting the lamp together don't forget to clip the bottom of the shade to the pole or it will not stand straight.
customer_reviews.author: paul t

customer_reviews.title: So very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Like rice paper shades. Ordered 4 lamps and upon setting up the 4th lamp discovered the 1st 3 lamps have 2 seams on shades whereas the last shade has about 8 seams. Purchased through amazon. And they can't send me only a shade replacement I would have to return the whole lamp. Well I decided it would be best to say the lamp has character. Love the style of these. Such a delightful Change than the old boring lamps and shades in the old days. Foot control is nice too although we use the dimmers. Thank you Addesso.
customer_reviews.author: Shoppers Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great lamps!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous lamp! We bought these in preparation for our new sectional sofa, and to be honest, they look WAY too nice next to our old recliner and leather couch. The base is solid wood and very heavy, so no need to worry about our 20 month-old turning them over. We also used the recommended bulbs and unlike some of the other reviews, I think they're very bright! The rice paper shade enhances the light big time. We may bump down to one or two bulbs if we decide its just too bright.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney H.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful...
customer_reviews.text: but with 3-100 Watt bulbs, it can be seen from outer space! I had to loosen 2 bulbs to make it reasonably bright. But it's well made, and super easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: V. Cava

customer_reviews.title: Sytlish and bright lamp
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good lamp with a sleek and stylish design which gives out a good amount of light which is what I was looking for. I use energy saving light bulbs which go unnoticed given the cover. One note, the cover is cylinder or circular in shape and from the pictures I was somehow given the impression it had square or rectangular like properties. Also, this product may be a tad bit overvalued but this is the price lazy shoppers such as myself are willing to pay. Nonetheless, I think I will purchase another given the open spaced nature of my dwelling, The two shall compliment each other quite nicely, in my humble opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Robespierre

customer_reviews.title: Like it a lot, thought paper would look nicer.  Wish lights were more spread out.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 sylvania 60W warm white 2700K LED bulbs and they are bright in a good sized room. Could probably use 40W bulbs and have good light for a smaller room. Pretty solid compared to a cheaper looking $19 version at Lowes. Base looks nice. Pretty solid and screws on pipes are deep enough to seem solid for a while. Minutes to assemble. Easy to slide shade up and replace bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: mpinch

customer_reviews.title: High quality lamp at an excellent price!
customer_reviews.text: The lamp was very easy to assemble and set up. I used three 40watt LED bulbs in mine and it's just the right amount of light to illuminate the corner. Love having the foot press button to turn the light on and off. Though I wish the cord were a tad longer and a color other than black, it's not enough to downgrade my rating because, overall, the lamp is of excellent quality and appearance.
customer_reviews.author: CBI

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy lamp with heavy wood base
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy lamp with heavy wood base. Paper has held up very well over time, diffuses light across room very well.
customer_reviews.author: Dallin Siddoway

customer_reviews.title: This is absolutely the most beautiful floor lamp
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely the most beautiful floor lamp! I bought the daylight bulbs to use for it and it brightens our whole office. Good quality for the price and so much better than the IKEA looking version. This lamp uses 3 bulbs which maximizes the lighting where the IKEA version only uses 1 bulb. I'd buy this again and recommend to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: A. Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sleek and powerful
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE (June 2015): Just bought a second one. Pretty much tells you all you need to know. This was a very pleasant discovery. I was reluctantly planning to pay a lot more on an ugly floor lamp when my old one died after about 15 years of service. The Adesso was very easy to assemble and is very bright without blinding. Maybe it would be nice to adjust the strength, but I think I can buy a separate adapter for that.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Fussy

customer_reviews.title: These are beautiful, I bought two - one for my bedroom ...
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful, I bought two - one for my bedroom and one for my living room and I love them. The light bulbs are kinda bright but that's an easy fix. They are a paper type material so if you have a mischievous kitty, beware.
customer_reviews.author: ash3s

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous lamp!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this lamp! It was super simple to assemble, just screw the poles together and hang the shade. The power cord is already threaded through them for you. Looks great and is made with sturdy materials. A nice heavy wood base, and thick metal pole. The price may seem a little high, but you get what you pay for... Quality!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael warren

customer_reviews.title: Great Lamps, Horrible Packaging
customer_reviews.text: There isn't a bad thing about these lamps from any stand point: tall, great lighting, made well and they look great. I bought two, but I only use one because that's how much light they point out even though I'm only using 60 watt bulbs. But I will say Adesso really cheaped out on the packaging which is two pieces of low quality styrofoam between two thin sheets of cardboard wrapped together with a lot of tape. Styrofoam went everywhere, that was 2 months ago and I'm still finding little white balls in my apartment.
customer_reviews.author: JDHeathen

customer_reviews.title: Cheap switch
customer_reviews.text: Paid almost 70$ and the switch broke 3 months in. Now I'm writing this review in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: Pizzmunoz

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp for living rooms
customer_reviews.text: This an excellent lamp for the price. I am using 3 40 watt equivalent LED bulbs and it lights up the entire living room nicely. The shade was damaged upon arrival, but a quick call to the company and a replacement shade arrived within 3-4 days. Great customer service, lamp is sturdy and was easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp! Decent quality. The light is bright when all bulbs are in.
customer_reviews.author: telesha

customer_reviews.title: Good looking lamp
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is made well and was easy to put together. The build quality is a lot better than similar lamps sold at Ikea (we have a couple of those as well). The only thing I wish it had is a built in dimmer. I bought a dimmer cord separately for about $7, so not a huge issue, but it does add some extra cord to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: Rex B.

customer_reviews.title: well made, attractive, good value
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be well made and it is very easy to put together. I use it with three 40 watt equivalent LED bulbs which provides adequate illumination without heat. Be aware that the switch is on the cord, operated by foot. That works fine for me but it could be a problem if you are going to place the lamp in an area where the cord is not easily accessed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Streit

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, easy to set up, but it is not perfectly straight
customer_reviews.text: I do like this lamp. It is easy to setup and I do see the three individual bulbs lit up when it is turned on just like the picture. My one complaint is that the lamp is not perfectly straight after setup. The quick fix is to turn it so that you don't see it not being straight.
customer_reviews.author: hitech guy

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged, no damage to any part. Very easy to assemble as it's pretty obvious. Perfect size and ample lighting with 60w bulbs. Looks expensive. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: They cast a perfect amount of light
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute and bright. I was decorating a model apartment and the living room area was a bit dark. I purchased two and put one on each side of the fireplace. They cast a perfect amount of light. It's bright and welcoming without feeling like you are in an interrogation room. I will be buying another pair for my office and another model I am designing.
customer_reviews.author: Mendi J.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is beautiful! Great quality. I find this price reasonable and would buy it again. The shipping was fast, received before I expected it. The only thing - I didn't like the way it was packaged: the Styrofoam packaging material broke into tiny pieces and was stock all over the lamp. I had to vacuum it. But I guess it protected the lamp from damaging during shipment. So all good.
customer_reviews.author: AzCu

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I returned only because it didn't really fit my need BUT it's well made. The base is solid and a lovely shade of reddish brown. It actually matched my floor perfectly. The light is warm and pleasant. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: ClaudyLA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks wonderful and I get a lot of compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Ceejdee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Lamp
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality lamp. It uses three lightbulb and is bright enough to light up a bedroom or small living room. The lamp is pretty tall and looks substantial. I might buy a second one....
customer_reviews.author: Hunter K Boston

customer_reviews.title: What I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Just as described in appearance. Exactly what I needed for lighting a dark corner in our living room. Used 40 watt bulbs and gives off enough light to read on the couch without overwhelming the tv screen. Followed the directions and simple to assemble. Securely packaged. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy S.

customer_reviews.title: Just love it...
customer_reviews.text: Very, very cool floor lamp. I love the eclectic look and this lamp absolutely sets the bar. Also while having a muted light source it provides plenty of light. I only used 60 watt bulbs and said it could take 100 watts but this certainly is light and bright.
customer_reviews.author: Kathi

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Lets off a lot of light and was exactly what I needed for my living room area. I had no issue with getting the "three bulb glow" look as was mentioned in some of the other reviews. I also don't seem to notice the lamp looking crooked either, as some others had complained about as well...maybe due to the spiraling spines in the lamp shade? I'm not sure, but to me it looks fine.
customer_reviews.author: NinaChrissy

customer_reviews.title: Very expensive looking
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Surprisingly bright. I bought very low watt bulbs and it was still to bright for what I wanted but they're great lamps.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda P.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Light for Bedroom or Playroom -- Very Bright & Informal
customer_reviews.text: I bought this light for my dining room and ended up moving it to my bedroom. It looks cheap and very bright against grey walls and in a more formal setting.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky S

customer_reviews.title: This lamp adds very nice ambiance and decor to my room
customer_reviews.text: This lamp adds very nice ambiance and decor to my room. It arrived on time, and all parts unscratched. It takes up very little room and provides good atmosphere.
customer_reviews.author: Andres Cardona Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Super bright lamp that could be used to light up a living room. I use it in my bedroom with 1 light bulb. This lamp can use 3 light bulbs, but it was so bright that I only used 1 bulb. I light the simplicity of the design and it doesn't take up too much space.
customer_reviews.author: A. DeMarco

customer_reviews.title: Love this lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Very solid wood base and overall construction. Paper shade is sturdy. Bright enough to light our small living room. And its sleek design looks great with our other furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Tom K.

customer_reviews.title: Love the look and also the light this lamp gives ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and also the light this lamp gives off for reading. So many of these types are only for ambience lighting. Good buy. Did have small hole in shade, but immediately applied a little white glue to contain further damage.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Scott

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this and only had it two months and the switch quit working. I initially loved the lamp - but it's useless when you cannot turn it on. I'm very disappointed and not able to exchange. Update - the switch finally came on - only to blow like a fuse and smelled hot. I wonder if this was a fire hazard. I cannot return it to Amazon and have tried finding a way through the internet to contact Adesso and can only find stores or websites that sale Adesso products.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Let there be light.
customer_reviews.text: So pretty and gives out so much light. If you have a dark room or corner, this will solve your problem.
customer_reviews.author: MGW

customer_reviews.title: Really great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this Floor Lamp! I bought two and am so pleased with the purchased. I definitely recommend them if your looking for more than efficient floor lamps. The price is well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Candi

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp for the price
customer_reviews.text: My only regret is that they didn't make the shade with one piece instead of two. With one you can hide the seam toward the back, but they used two pieces and therefore both show up from one viewpoint or another.
customer_reviews.author: CathyC

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic looking, sturdy lamp, assembles in less than 5 minutes
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is very modern and attractive. I assembled it in minutes and the base is nice and sturdy. As many of the other reviews state, this emits a LOT of light if you use 3 100-watt bulbs. I am using 2 75-watt energy saver bulbs and it is still very bright.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great lamp and nice n' tall. Perfect for an 8' or 9' ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M

customer_reviews.title: Lamp died in less than a year.
customer_reviews.text: These lamps look great for the price but after purchasing two in early December 2015, one died a month or so ago.
customer_reviews.author: Miss S

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Nice lite. Broke after 6 months. is there a warranty?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful floor Lamp
customer_reviews.text: best Lamp i ever had an working with this company was awesome. very good customer service an a beautiful lamp for the money . you can't go wrong i love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these lamps! Great deal, they create a nice soft light
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: not bad
customer_reviews.text: bought it for my sister's apartment. Very nice budget contemporary piece. the step-on-button is very convenient. Adds a good amount of light to her dim apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Seemz

customer_reviews.title: Bright and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Bright and easy to assemble! The base is heavy nice quality. The shade is thin and let's plenty of light through. We used 3 100 watt bulbs and it is perfect! I love the switch on the floor which is part of the cord which extends. Terrific floor lamp!
customer_reviews.author: Jack DeGiovanni

customer_reviews.title: Not bad. pretty bright with all the bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Not bad. pretty bright with all the bulbs. I took it down to 2 bulbs and it is fine in the corner of my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Penti

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality switch does not work only after a few months
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 lamps for both the switch stopped working after a few months good lamp poor quality switch
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: I am super happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the office. It gives off a lot of lighting without being obnoxious. And it looks really modern. I am super happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary L Fisher

customer_reviews.title: This was the perfect lighting for our space
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect lighting for our space. We needed additional lighting in our great room and It fits perfectly with our contemporary decor.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Wright

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good lamp for what we used it for. Would probably have liked a light at the top as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jack I.

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: It fits into our living area and gives cozy light at night with two 40W scrub-surfaced bulbs. Three 60W bulbs would be too bright.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp! It was super easy to put together and is perfect for my livingroom. I wouldn't recommend it for a large room if you are wanting a lot of light. But my apartment is small and this works perfectly. I get a lot of compliments on it also.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Casares

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lots of light. had bought a similar lamp last year, had only one light...this lamp has three.
customer_reviews.author: danny blanton

customer_reviews.title: Feels sturdy and heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Feels sturdy and heavy duty. Personally not a fan of the dark red hued solid wood base but overall a gorgeous product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: love these. very elegant and go great in the living room. shipping was fast and was as expected
customer_reviews.author: AznMatt

customer_reviews.title: I love the light
customer_reviews.text: I love the light .beware that it does not have a dimmer like description. There for 4 stars. I like it that much.
customer_reviews.author: Gina P.

customer_reviews.title: very happy. I use it with 3x100 watt bulbs and ...
customer_reviews.text: very happy. I use it with 3x100 watt bulbs and a dimmer switch (purchased separately). it can illuminate a whole room or provide a soft glow when dimmed.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Looks better than the similar Ikea lamp. I really like the look of it. It comes with 3 places for bulbs but I like using 2, 3 was too bright.
customer_reviews.author: meow

customer_reviews.title: Love this light
customer_reviews.text: Love this light. It looks nice and was very easy to assemble. Gives off a good amount of light but really adds so much to a room.
customer_reviews.author: andrea barouh

customer_reviews.title: Great livingroom lamp
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful construction, excellent quality, & much brighter than my previous Ikea lamp. You can actually use this as a light source not just decor. More than I expected and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: luv2shop83

customer_reviews.title: love this lamp
customer_reviews.text: love this lamp, I bought two of them use in my media/gaming/home theater room. I use two Philips 424381 11-watt A19 LED's in each which is plenty of light for my room
customer_reviews.author: M Robinson

customer_reviews.title: I think it would look a lot better lit up
customer_reviews.text: The switch doesn't work. I think it would look a lot better lit up. ;p
customer_reviews.author: truckee river

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing looking lamp and gives great lighting compared to other floor lamps.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Trujillo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lamp! Use very low wattage bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful lamp! Use very low wattage bulbs, it's very bright with 60 watts. We are going to get another one.
customer_reviews.author: May

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamps. Very IKEA
customer_reviews.text: Nice lamps. Very IKEA. Easy to set-up. Softens the room. Recommend using only two bulbs. If using three, use lower wattage (40w perhaps).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, easy to assemble, adds just the right glow to the corner of my office. Interesting enough to get compliments, but not unprofessional.
customer_reviews.author: MiniMogur

customer_reviews.title: Very  Satisfied!!
customer_reviews.text: The Package came as promised. Very easy to assemble. The bottom of the Lamp is made of solid wood which one can only assume will last for some time. The only downfall is that I have vaulted ceilings so they appear shorter in person. But still Love them. Yes, I did order 2 of them as some of the other Amazonian reviews stated they should have ordered 2. Glad I did. I have one for the Living room and 1 for the Family room. The Rice paper blends very well with other styles, and reveals adequate lightening. Will recommend to anyone that asks.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmers

customer_reviews.title: Adesso 4099-15 Gyoza floor lamp
customer_reviews.text: I am delighted with my purchase of the Adesso Floor Lamp. It was delivered on the stated date & well packaged. It was easy to assemble, good quality & enhances my living space. I would recommend this product. It is exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, but mine stopped working after a month
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, but mine stopped working after a month. I switched light bulbs, checked for wire scorching, and looked for loose wires. After all of that, it still doesn't work. I've tried everything I could think of besides replacing the wires, which will be a huge pain. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Tom  A Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Puts out a lot of light, looks elegant, is easy to put together.
customer_reviews.text: Puts out a lot of light, looks elegant, is easy to put together. Was bigger than I had expected. The rice paper could tear easily, although it hasn't happened to me. Overall very happy with this light.
customer_reviews.author: T. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Well packed, good value....
customer_reviews.text: As described. Simple to assemble. Nice to use in my evolving Japanese bedroom or tropical living room. Three more words were required after I had said what I needed to say......
customer_reviews.author: kingsharkey808

customer_reviews.title: Love it....but......
customer_reviews.text: Love the lamp; don't like the fact that it has 2 seams, so no matter how you position it, they show! Poor design; should have only 1 seam that can be turned to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive lamp
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp and it gives off such a nice light and is not harsh at all. The paper shade is very pretty also;. We are really pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: J. Waller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great lamps, soft light and looks expensive when it is not
customer_reviews.author: Heamo78

customer_reviews.title: The rice paper shade ripped on its own and I ...
customer_reviews.text: The rice paper shade ripped on its own and I am not sure if I can get a replacement part?
customer_reviews.author: Michael Catanese

customer_reviews.title: The rice paper shade isn't even- looks like there are holes in it due to uneven-ness no ...
customer_reviews.text: The rice paper shade isn't even- looks like there are holes in it due to uneven-ness no matter how you turn it. I wouldn't spend the money knowing what I know now.
customer_reviews.author: TammyD

customer_reviews.title: Nicer then IKEA similar lamp.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice simple lamp. Puts out a lot of light. Just put in 1 of 3. 60 watt bulb and puts out plenty of Iight. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: WST

customer_reviews.title: in the announcement says 2 lamp and only 1 arrived
customer_reviews.text: in the announcement says 2 lamp and only 1 arrived
customer_reviews.author: Darlin

customer_reviews.title: Such a deal !!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is so handsome. In our family room. It puts out nice light and is well maid.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a large room with no ceiling fixture. It is beautiful, lights up the entire room and was easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I always get compliments on this. It brightens up my living room only using one bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Aknldy

customer_reviews.title: Thanks to the manufacture the instructions were extremly easy to ensemble
customer_reviews.text: Just got it today. Thanks to the manufacture the instructions were extremly easy to ensemble. I did it by myself. Hurray. If I can do it you can do it too.
customer_reviews.author: OML

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lamp
customer_reviews.text: I reserve multitude of compliments about the lamp will purchase another.. New and modern look if your into original designs.
customer_reviews.author: SPP

product_meta.title: Adesso 4099-15 Gyoza Floorchiere Floor Lamp with Rice-Paper Shade, 12" x 12" x 67", Walnut
product_meta.description: Style:FloorchiereThe versatile Gyoza Floorchiere contributes modern style and drama as well as plenty of ambient light for a living room or den. The collapsible white rice paper shade adds a natural element to the décor while gently diffusing the illumination. The square walnut finished wood base adds to the natural look while providing stability. Lamp with 100 Watt bulbs for full brightness or experiment with lower wattages for mood lighting. A convenient foot step switch turns the lamp on and off. This lamp has a clear cord and is smart outlet compatible. Bulbs are not included. All Adesso lighting products are either UL listed or ETL listed, meaning it has been tested and approved to meet the government-regulated safety standards for the USA. When shopping for lighting products, we recommend to always look for the UL or ETL marks to ensure you are purchasing lighting that has been tested for safety standards by a 3rd party testing lab. Unfortunately, not all lighting products in the marketplace have been through 3rd party safety testing.
feature_bullets: Adds modern style and drama as well as plenty of ambient light for a living room or den
The collapsible white rice paper shade adds a natural element to the décor while gently diffusing the illumination
